title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Questions & Answers
description: Everything you need to know about joining and participating in our Tech Club
docsRepo: Club documentation and frequently asked questions

faqs.question: How can I join the Club?
faqs.answer: You can join our club by filling out the membership application form on our website. We welcome students interested in programming, design, and digital media.

faqs.question: What activities does the Club offer?
faqs.answer: We offer various activities including coding workshops, design training, AI research projects, media coverage of campus events, and technical competition opportunities.

faqs.question: Do I need previous experience?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required! We welcome beginners and provide comprehensive training in various technical skills. Your enthusiasm and willingness to learn are what matter most.

faqs.question: What equipment do I need?
faqs.answer: While having your own laptop is helpful, the club provides essential equipment for activities. We have development environments, design tools, and other necessary resources for member use.

faqs.question: How often does the club meet?
faqs.answer: We have weekly general meetings and additional workshop sessions. Members can participate in various projects based on their interests and availability.

faqs.question: Can I get involved in multiple areas?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We encourage members to explore different aspects of technology and find their interests. You can participate in multiple activities and projects.
